update T_BSS_CS_CONTRACT_REQUIRED
PLAN_NO = #{planNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STAND = #{stand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM = #{item,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_COUNT = #{purchaseCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DELIVER_DATE = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
DETAIL_ID=#{detailId},
TRANSPORT_FEES=#{transportFees},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT cc.STATUS FROM T_BSS_CS_PURCHASE_CONTRACT cc WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT core.CONTRACT_ID FROM T_BSS_CS_CONTRACT_REQUIRED core WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT PD. ID FROM T_BSS_PPMS_PROJECTS_DETAIL PD WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT DD. ID FROM T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_DETAIL DD WHERE DD.FILE_ID = #{id} AND PD.REQUIRED_ID = DD. ID ) AND CORE.DETAIL_ID = pd. ID ) AND CC. ID = core.CONTRACT_ID GROUP BY core.CONTRACT_ID )
